item.title: Why I Hate Language Benchmarks
item.description: [Originally from a Twitter Thread] Original Twitter Post I don’t know if I have “ranted” about this here before but: I absolutely HATE comparing programming languages with “benchmarks”. Language benchmarks rarely ever actually test for anything useful when comparing one language against another. This goes for ANY language. Even in the best case scenario: you are comparing different compilers for the same language (and the same input). This means that you are just comparing how well the optimizing backends work for those compilers.
